/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape.
